title: Mcp-Hfspace
description: A minimal setup MCP server for integrating Hugging Face Spaces with Claude Desktop, enabling tasks like image generation, text-to-speech, and speech-to-text.
creator: evalstate

MCP_HF_WORK_DIR.description: Directory for handling uploads and downloads of files including images and audio.

HF_TOKEN.description: Hugging Face API token for accessing private spaces and managing quotas.
